edge: Miles Teller portrays the character of Andrew Neiman, a 19-year-old jazz drummer who attends Shaffer Conservatory.
J. K. Simmons plays the role of Terence Fletcher, a strict jazz instructor at Shaffer Conservatory.
Paul Reiser acts as Jim Neiman, Andrew's father who is a writer turned high school teacher.
Melissa Benoist depicts Nicole, a movie theater employee who briefly dates Andrew.
Austin Stowell personifies Ryan Connolly, another drummer in Fletcher's band.
Nate Lang represents Carl Tanner, another drummer in Fletcher's band.
Chris Mulkey portrays Uncle Frank Neiman, Andrew's uncle.
Damon Gupton acts as Mr. Kramer, Andrew's first instructor before being recruited by Fletcher.
